titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before His Maiestie, at VVhitehall the fift of Nouember last, 1617. By the Bishop of Elie, His Maiesties almoner
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

notesStmt.note: Initial leaf contains large signature-mark "A" with part of a woodcut frame.
Also issued as part 2 of the collection of sermons without general title page (STC 624.5) commencing with "The copie of the sermon preached on Good-Friday before the Kings Maiestie".
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
